shortDescription: üîß ENTERPRISE TYPESCRIPT FIXES: Complete Systematic Error Resolution (282‚Üí0 Errors)
problem: 282 TypeScript compilation errors were blocking the build process across the entire application, preventing development and deployment. Errors included path import issues, type safety violations, JSX module resolution problems, and architectural inconsistencies.
cause: Accumulated technical debt from rapid development, inconsistent import patterns, missing type definitions, @/ alias path issues, and mixed .ts/.tsx file extensions causing module resolution failures.
filesChanged: - Converted @/ alias imports ‚Üí relative paths across entire codebase
- Fixed JSX file extensions (.ts ‚Üí .tsx) for proper module resolution
- Fixed type-only imports separation across all snap engines
- Fixed GreekAdminLevel import (type ‚Üí value) in administrative boundaries
- Resolved GEO_COLORS import for theme provider compatibility
- Enhanced entity renderer type safety across rendering pipeline
- Net reduction: -2,049 lines (quality improvement + legacy cleanup)
- 7 files renamed (.ts ‚Üí .tsx for proper JSX handling)
